caption.title: Relationship between value profile of locations selected and the probability of flooding damage.
caption.p: The probability of flooding damage is taken according to the flooding model depicted in Fig 1. The size of the respective compartment is proportional to the number of observations in the respective category. PLV = "Place valuer", MLS = "My lifestyle", ENV = "Environmental", LCO = "The local community", BEA = "Beauty", MEC = "My economy". Based on raw data before imputation.
